movieDBquiz

Class MatchingQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • movieDBquiz.MatchingQuestion

  • public class MatchingQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that creates matching questions for a movie trivia quiz using the TMDB API.
    Version:
    1.0 Summer 2017
    Author:
    David Bizzocchi, Josh Aitken, Caitlin Heyn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatchingQuestion()
      Constructs a matching question object to be used in the quiz.

    • Method Summary

      void addAnswerTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Adds a movie title to the list of possible answers to the current question.
      MatchingQuestion generateQuestion()
      Generates a randomized question with a corresponding randomized set of answers one of which is the correct answer.

      Retrieves the index of the answer selected by the user.

      Gets the description of the movie to be used in the question.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchingQuestion

        public MatchingQuestion()
        Constructs a matching question object to be used in the quiz. It instantiates necessary variables and creates a new session with TMDB. It also randomizes movies to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getMovieList

        public java.util.List<info.movito.themoviedbapi.model.MovieDb> getMovieList()
        Retrieves the list of movies to be used on the quiz.
        Returns:
        movieList the list of movies to be used.

      • addAnswerTitle

        public void addAnswerTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Adds a movie title to the list of possible answers to the current question.
        Parameters:
        title - the movie title to be added to the possible answers.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the title given doesn't exist or is only whitespace.

      • getMovieDesc

        public java.lang.String getMovieDesc()
        Gets the description of the movie to be used in the question.
        Returns:
        String movieDesc the description from TMDB API of the movie.

      • getPossibleAnswers

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPossibleAnswers()
        Returns the array of possible answers for the current question.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of possible answers to the current question

      • getAnswerIndex

        public int getAnswerIndex()
        Retrieves the index of the answer selected by the user.
        Returns:
        Integer of the answer in the ArrayList possibleAnswers

      • setMovieDesc

        public void setMovieDesc(java.lang.String movieDesc)
        Sets the description of the movie for the question.
        Parameters:
        movieDesc - The description of the movie from TMDB API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the string given is null or contains only whitespace.

      • setAnswerIndex

        public void setAnswerIndex(int answerIndex)
        Sets the index of the correct answer in possibleAnswers.
        Parameters:
        answerIndex - the correct answer for the question.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the index is invalid.

      • setCorrectAnswer

        public void setCorrectAnswer(boolean correctAnswer)
        Sets the answer selected by the user are correct or incorrect.
        Parameters:
        correctAnswer - true if the answer chosen is correct false if the answer chosen isn't correct

      • isCorrectAnswer

        public boolean isCorrectAnswer()
        Retrieves if the answer selected by the user was the correct question.
        Returns:
        true if the answer selected was correct false if the answer selected was incorrect

      • generateQuestion

        public MatchingQuestion generateQuestion()
        Generates a randomized question with a corresponding randomized set of answers one of which is the correct answer.
        Returns:
        MatchingQuestion the question that was generated.
